full_text: Israel has launched the most intense bombardment of its five-day Gaza military operation, adding tank and artillery fire to its airstrike campaign https://t.co/jIjXjzU6pv

localize.full_text: イスラエルは、5日間にわたるガザの軍事作戦の中で最も激しい砲撃を開始し、空爆に加えて戦車や砲撃を追加した。https://t.co/jIjXjzU6pv
